name: com.eren.2dcomplete
description: Eren's custom 2D gamekit for creating platformer & topdown games with ease. It contains tonnes of custom editors and components to streamline your game development, as well as ready-made templates & prefabs. Everything is fully customisable to create your unique dream 2D game quickly and easily.

samples.description: Contains a sample platformer game with player, enemy and other elements
Contains a sample topdown game with player and other elements
